solution_line_template: Kate bought {red_packs} packs × {balls_per_pack} balls/pack = <<{red_packs}*{balls_per_pack}={red_balls}>>{red_balls} red bouncy balls.
She also bought {yellow_packs} packs × {balls_per_pack} balls/pack = <<{yellow_packs}*{balls_per_pack}={yellow_balls}>>{yellow_balls} yellow bouncy balls.
Kate bought {red_balls} balls - {yellow_balls} balls= <<{red_balls}-{yellow_balls}={difference}>>{difference} more red bouncy balls than yellow bouncy balls.
